summary.para: Gets the state of a check box item in a tree-view control.

param.name: pbCheck
param.para: A pointer to a BOOL that contains the state of the check box.
The check box is not checked.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the state of a check box item in a tree-view control.

param.name: bCheck
param.para: A BOOL that sets the state of the check box.
The check box is not checked.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
